Consent Management App

Consent Terms

By scanning this QR code and accepting the terms, you grant permission and consent to Vibes Nightclub, a company located at Westlands, 401Lane, (hereafter referred to as "the Company"), to publish, republish, or otherwise transmit photos, video, and audio taken during your presence at Vibes Nightclub in Nairobi on and after the 26th of November 2023, along with your name and other identifiers (Materials) on the Company’s social media channels and any other means which might be used for the Company’s publicity/marketing both internally, within the Company and its affiliates, or to the public. The Materials may be used without limit of time and place, globally.

The personal data (meaning parts of the Materials that depict your image, record your voice, and details such as your name) shall be processed by the Company, who is the controller and responsible for such personal data.

You are hereby informed and understand that you have the right to withdraw the consent you have given at any time by contacting Vibes Nightclub's office at Consent@vibesclub.co.ke

You understand that this will not affect the lawfulness of any processing carried out by the Company before you withdraw your consent.
